what3words_tools.name: What3words Tools
what3words_tools.help: This group provides functions for working with what3words addresses and coordinates.

functions.name: convert_to_coord
functions.description: Convert a what3words address to latitude and longitude.

functions.name: convert_to_3wa
functions.description: Convert latitude and longitude to a what3words address.

functions.name: autosuggest_w3w
functions.description: Get autosuggestions for a partial what3words address.

parameters.name: partial_w3w_address
parameters.description: The partial what3words address to suggest completions for.

parameters.name: rank
parameters.description: The rank of the suggestion to return (e.g., 1 for the top suggestion).

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: Optional settings like language, country, bounding box, or focus for more accurate suggestions.

functions.name: change_w3w_language
functions.description: Change the language of a what3words address.

parameters.name: w3w_address
parameters.description: The what3words address to convert to another language.

parameters.name: language_code
parameters.description: The target language code (e.g., 'es' for Spanish).
